Class ec.ifc.stonelook.SLBezelBorder 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.Border
           |
           +----ec.ifc.stonelook.SLBezelBorder
public class SLBezelBorder
extends Border
A tan bezel that's part of the stone-texture look. This is used for several of the other SL classes, and can be used by itself.

ROUNDED_CORNERS
used in constructors and setCornerStyle to get rounded corners
SQUARED_CORNERS
used in constructors and setCornerStyle to get sharp corners

SLBezelBorder(int)
Creates an SLBezelBorder of the specified type with squared corners.
SLBezelBorder(int, int)
Creates an SLBezelBorder of the specified type with the specified corner style.

bottomMargin()
drawBezel(Graphics, int, int, int, int, boolean, boolean)
Convenience method for drawing a stone-looking bezel without having to create a bezel object.
drawInRect(Graphics, int, int, int, int)
Overridden to draw stone-looking bezel.
getCornerStyle()
Returns the style for this bezel's corners.
leftMargin()
rightMargin()
setCornerStyle(int)
Sets the style for this bezel's corners.
topMargin()

SQUARED_CORNERS 
  public final static int SQUARED_CORNERS
used in constructors and setCornerStyle to get sharp corners
ROUNDED_CORNERS 
  public final static int ROUNDED_CORNERS
used in constructors and setCornerStyle to get rounded corners

SLBezelBorder 
  public SLBezelBorder(int type)
Creates an SLBezelBorder of the specified type with squared corners. The type must be either BezelBorder.LOWERED or BezelBorder.RAISED.
SLBezelBorder 
  public SLBezelBorder(int type,
                       int cornerStyle)
Creates an SLBezelBorder of the specified type with the specified corner style. The type must be either BezelBorder.LOWERED or BezelBorder.RAISED. The corner style must be either SLBezelBorder.SQUARED_CORNERS or SLBezelBorder.ROUNDED_CORNERS

drawBezel 
  public static void drawBezel(Graphics g,
                               int x,
                               int y,
                               int width,
                               int height,
                               boolean raised,
                               boolean rounded)
Convenience method for drawing a stone-looking bezel without having to create a bezel object.
drawInRect 
  public void drawInRect(Graphics g,
                         int x,
                         int y,
                         int width,
                         int height)
Overridden to draw stone-looking bezel.

drawInRect in class Border
bottomMargin 
  public int bottomMargin()
Overrides:
bottomMargin in class Border
getCornerStyle 
  public int getCornerStyle()
Returns the style for this bezel's corners. The valid values are SLBezelBorder.ROUNDED_CORNERS and SLBezelBorder.SQUARED_CORNERS.
leftMargin 
  public int leftMargin()
